page.title: 14Farming
page.content: Unigate Dairy, St.Erth The dairy produces some 2OO,OOO pints of milk a day in bottles for mainly local consumption, these are delivered by a fleet of l7 floats. The rest of the milk which has been stored in large silos is made into butter, skimmed milk (24 tons per day), cream (l ton a day in the summer- which is mainly posted to all over the country) and yogart. The products are sold to such firms as Tesco, Primrose Dairies and Marks & Spencers and they find there way into shops all over the United Kingdom.
